What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. 2. 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Other Knight creatures get +1/+1 and are Indestructible

So I had the Knight Exemplar out and a Phyrexian Crusader at 3/3 attacking and was blocked by a Plague Stinger at 4/4 (had enchantments). The Crusader took 4 damage and was killed and put in graveyard. My understanding was that the lethal protection should have been granted by the Exemplar. Perhaps I misunderstood though. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.26

author: [clayton....@ymail.com](https://code.google.com/u/115389003795609959110/)
title: Knight Exemplar - Indestructible part not working

comments.body:
Plague Stinger has infect, which puts -1/-1 counters on creatures that it hits. The crusader would have had 4 -1/-1 counters which would make it -1/-1. When that happens it is put into the graveyard due to its toughness being reduced to -1 and not due to lethal damage. 

See http://mtg.wikia.com/wiki/Indestructible for more info about what can kill an indestructible creature.

**Status:** Invalid
